title: President Rajapaksa declares open Gnanam Memorial Operating Theater at Maharagama Cancer Hospital
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix By: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa declared open Deshamanya A.Y.S Gnanam Memorial Operating Theater Complex at Maharagama Cancer Hospital premises this afternoon on 5th April….
